entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gimli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gimli 04:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -28.7°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
